questions.frequency: How often do you play board or card games?
questions.firstTime: Are you playing this game for the first time?
questions.playStyle: What kind of games do you like to play?
questions.strategic: How strategic did you find the game?
questions.luckFactor: How luck-dependent did you find the game?
questions.funFactor: How fun was the game for you?
questions.replayValue: How high is the replay value of the game?
questions.excitement: How exciting were your game decisions?
questions.uniqueness: How unique did you find the game?
questions.clarity: How clear were the game rules for you?
